name: Detour (itch) (Thob, Bastinus Rex)
description:
DETOUR

Detour is a little walking simulator where you drive a small car on the way home.

We made this prototype with Bastinus Rex for the Mix and Game Jam ! The theme is "Dimension Change (Take a game mechanic from one dimension and recreate it in another)".

We were inspired by Darwood, a horror game in 2D Top down where the character has a vision of his environment, but only reveals them when he lights them directly.

HOW TO PLAY ?
- Move by moving your cursor on the road, the car follow your mouse. - Turn off/on the engine by cliking with the right button

  We hope you'll like it !
